snippet: The live stream, which will be available only to cable and satellite subscribers, is the first time that any major broadcaster has turned on such a technology.
abstract: ABC is planning to allow users in New York and Philadelphia to live-stream all programming from its local stations on iPhone and iPads, marking first time any major broadcaster has turned on such technology; live stream will be available to cable and satellite subscribers in effort to keep up with changing expectations and habits of viewers.
lead_paragraph: The live stream, which will be available only to cable and satellite subscribers, is the first time that any major broadcaster has turned on such a technology.

headline.seo: ABC to Live-Stream Its Shows via App
headline.main: ABC to Live-Stream Its Shows via App
headline.print_headline: Watching a Network on the Go
